entry.title: The Great Stuffs
entry.content:
Curating things that deserve respect.

CharityðŸ”—

  • Give Well - GiveWellâ€™s mission is to find outstanding giving opportunities and publish the full details of our analysis to help donors decide where to give. They publish a list of top charities, which are their recommendations for donors. GiveWell is focused on finding a small number of outstanding giving opportunities, not on reviewing as many charities â€” or as many causes â€” as possible.
    • Top Charities
  • Give Directly - Lift one person above poverty by donating $30/mo. Direct giving is an efficient, proven, and empowering way to help.
